Policy PlannerÂ¶

The Policy Planner application is a ticketing system to plan and automate change requests.

  • firemon_api.apps.policyplanner.packets
  • firemon_api.apps.policyplanner.policyplan
  • firemon_api.apps.policyplanner.siql
  • firemon_api.apps.policyplanner.tasks
  • firemon_api.apps.policyplanner.workflows

FireMon-API is a Python web wrapper for the FireMon SIP (Security Mangager, etc...) APIs. The intent is make something that is useful for quick and easy development against FireMon products.
